column4: Hi, I just installed the new kernel update and my LED is flashing like crazy now. It's pretty annoying. Has anyone else had this problem with intel wireless cards?

i your system responsive? i am pretty sure you are experiencing a kernel panic. my system does hat too, i am very sure it has something to do with the new broadcom driver(i am assuming you are using it)
My system is running fine. The wifi works too. It's the iwl3945 driver
well, then, there goes my conspiracy theory :)
